(rant) I went to a slaughterhouse yesterday
WRITING.TEXT: Our DxE group were on the slaughterhouse gate with signs and stuff, watching the trucks packed with terrified animals go inside one after other, then leave empty. We only were there for a few hours and in that short amount of time, I saw (out of many other stuff, with the sounds of pigs screaming like little children being gutted in the background) 1. A calf with their leg sticking out, stuck on the truck door, being forced to balance themselves. 2. A panicking young bull with his horn stuck on the door, squeezed by his mates, unable to move and drooling waterfalls due to stress 3. A truck unloading its animals; one of the cows in particular absolutely did NOT want to go down, fought with their life to climb back to the truck over and over until a worker dug an electric stick to make them jump down, and was made to walk to their death along the others. At that point I started weeping, which triggered other activists to also cry, and the guard at the gate started laughing at us as if it was the most hilarious thing! And telling us "that's the way god intended it to be". By the way, right by the other side of the road, all while we tried to comfort those animals who were on their way to their death... a woman was petting and hugging her happy dogs, not a care in the world. Left side: cute doggies!!!!!! Right side: yummy food!!!! So fucked up.

WRITING.TITLE: We put down our 10 month old puppy today. Anybody, please, just send me condolences. Please.
WRITING.TEXT: She arrived january 1st. A tiny fluffy yellow mutt with white freckles on her nose. Someone found her on a highway in the middle of nowhere and my mom decided to give her a home. I was hesitant but Morgan quickly earned our hearts. Smart girl learned tricks so fast and loved jumping to your lap like a cat. Never tore any stuff aside of some underwear. Such a well behaved baby! We just had a happy, normal walk day on tuesday and then two days ago she starts seizing nonstop and acting out of her. Her liver wasnt working. At the end she was stuck in an eternal seizure amp; we took the difficult decision to let her go. I dont have many friends and ive posted about her loss in social media amp; have barely gotten any response. Nobody has told me any 'sorry for your loss' or cared at all. I feel devastated and alone. I need please someone to aknowledge her existence and loss. I feel like Im on my own on this. I miss her so much. She was a light on my life and I couldnt save her. She trusted us and I feel like Ive failed her. I burst into tears when I think about how her toy will never be played with anymore. She was only a baby and she didnt have a chance. The disease was inherited and no one could have suspected it. I keep thinking I'll wake up from this nightmare. Everything was alright just a few days ago. ------------- edit: you're all amazing, thank you so much for the love. In the middle of this pain it genuinely means so much that other people know that she was existed. Thank you.

gt; where they love their bees more than anything and they would not hurt them. If you find someone who makes dogs work all of their life amp; they kill the leader of the pack because she's not being productive enough, or smashing dogs against each other when fumbling with their cages, the way it happens with bees... I wouldn't call that love. Animals are here with us, not for us.

**eggs**: Hens have been bred to overproduce eggs, which leads to de nourishment of calcium and other nutrients that the hen needs. Laying extra eggs also apply pressure to the egg-laying organs which cause premature death. By consuming eggs, even #8220;farmed raised #8221; and backyard ones, you are telling others that it is ok to consume eggs, so long as the hens are treated in a way that you are comfortable with. **honey** Due to the immense demand for honey, bee-keepers have to take short cuts to keep up with production quotas and end up harming the bees in the process. Bees won #8217;t make honey unless they have a queen, so to stop the queen flying away and leaving the hive her wings are often cut or pulled off. She is artificially inseminated repeatedly (therefore denied natural mating behaviour) and to extract sperm to impregnate her with, the male bees are crushed/squeezed to death until their reproductive organs pop out and the sperm can be taken. Queen bees can live to be 5 years old but are usually killed and replaced every 1-2 years. New queens are transported long distances and are often roughly handled, damaged or even killed in the process. Whole hives are also transported from place-to-place which is distressing for the bees and confuses their natural navigation system. In large-scale honey farms before winter the bee-keepers will often take 100% of the honey and replace it with a cheap, watered down sugar substitute which is not as good for the bees or, if that option is too costly, they are simply all killed off via gassing and replaced with new bees in the spring. https://katelouisepowell.tumblr.com/post/124587891449/as-a-vegan-do-you-eat-honey-and-if-no-whats-so

Yeah, its no good to apply hypotheticals when it comes to discussing whether if its okay to exploit sentient beings. OP is already using this hypothetical to justify supporting harm to actual beings. gt; so if we all stop buying honey then bees will disappear. the species of bee used for honey production (Apis mellifera) are not even close to being endangered and the honey industry only helps increase numbers of these domestic honey bees, not wild bee populations. This is a big problem since these domestic bees they exploit for honey are actually extremely threatening to wild bees populations, wild bees that are better pollinators and are crucial to the environment. https://m4w.tumblr.com/post/184270378713/severelynerdysheep-ellesmalbec#notes

WRITING.TITLE: Update: I'm holding my mom accountable for letting my abuser around me. I'd really appreciate support.
WRITING.TEXT: An update on this post: https://www.reddit.com/r/survivorsofabuse/comments/hbk709/just_found_out_today_i_ordered_food_from_my/ I sent my mom a letter trying to hold her accountable for having let my abuser around me. I texted all of my thoughts towards her amp; I'm absolutely terrified of her answer, she's calling me on the phone right now (I'm not picking up), my heart is going so so fast. I want to cry but I also want to be strong. I don't know what to do because I don't want to talk about it. I don't want to see her answer. But I know what I'm doing is for the better. If anyone can relate to anything similar I'd really appreciate some input. I don't know how to handle this but by opening up about this I know I'm doing the right thing.

WRITING.TITLE: eally hurt at the recent trend of people yelling "men who like short/petite/flat/young looking women are pedophiles!", as a short petite flat young looking woman.
WRITING.TEXT: TW: CSA Please remember that lots of women who hear you say stuff like that are child sexual abuse survivors themselves, and it's absolutely horrid to hear "the only reason anyone would find you attractive is because they remind you of a child". "Only perverts would be into you". "Your body is just wrong". It doesn't matter how flat, or short, or thin, or petite a woman is, it doesn't matter if she dresses with "childish" dresses, an adult woman is an adult woman, she's not "child coded", she's not "cattering to pedophiles", it's not "pedophile culture" that men can find us attractive. Pedophiles aren't attracted to adult women on pigtails, they're attracted to kids. If attraction to kids could also apply to women, there would be no need to even exploit children for sexual acts on camera; they'd just hire short flat women for videos. Please stop calling us "child-like" for features we can't help. It's incredibly hurtful. Moreso if you preach body positivity or whatever, you're doing the exact opposite of it. **editting to add** that I 100% disagree that women with my body type being sexual in porn can normalize pedophilia. Please realize how popular incest categories are, and despite it, incest remains as one of the biggest taboos in real life. If it's involving a consenting adult woman, it's not even remotely pedophilia. "but it's still creepy for men to be attracted to girls who look younger"; There are teens who look +18, is it suddenly not pedophilia to pursue them because of their looks? The little toddlers at child pageants made to look as older women for older people's entertainment (gags), does it stop being pedophilia because "they don't look child-like"? Pedophilia is the attraction to children. An adult woman isn't a child. Attraction to an adult woman, no matter how she looks, if she shaves, if she's flat, is not pedophilia.

gt; but I will say that dressing childish (like popular egirls) and doing the voice stuff is child coding and normalizes pedophilia. Pedophilia is attracton to children. An adult dressing childish or having a high pitched voice (which I happen to have too) isn't catering to pedophiles for the basic reason that they're not a child. A woman can dress with diapers and a bib even, yet at the end of the day that's the body amp; mind of a grown woman, not a vulnerable child being coherced, manipulated amp; forced into sex acts which is what pedophiles are attracted to. Porn is full of "step-dad sex" or "I fucked my sibling" categories which are also incredibly popular, and not only most people who watch those have zero desire to fuck their actual mom, but incest in general isn't even close to be normalized. Anyone confesing to actually wanting to bang their step father is gonna get ostracized.
That's horrible, I'm so sorry you had to see your friends react like that!

gt; it give some (adult) creeps the idea that hitting a girl up is ok bc she's legal age. Disagreeing here; at 19 I had already moved out into another country, paid my rent amp; bills, voted, could legally drive amp; consume alcohol... amp; of course decide whether I wanted people to flirt with me, even if older than me(and I did), because I was a legal adult. If anything, it really pissed me off when people infantilized me due to my age when I was legally amp; mentally a whole adult. Not fond of the idea idea that women can't be responsible of their acts even after being 18. When do we get our independence, then? gt; Plus not sure porn is what we should look up to morally and ethically wise, since every woman it displays is "cut" into pieces that are then turned into a fetish :// Disagreeing here too; particularly on reddit you can see women sharing their pictures for sexual gratification. Are they "cutting themselves into pieces" or "fetishizing themselves"? Why is it now Woke to deny sexual agency to adult women? Why aren't we allowed to be horny, to show off our body; are we really taking a couple exploitative industres as an excuse to take back women's sexual liberation?

gt; there IS a trend of utilizing OPs body type for normalizing pedophilia. Pedophiles are into children. If a pedophile is aroused by children's bodies, amp; according to you my body type also counts to arouse a pedophile... Does this mean I should be suspicious of every person I've ever had sex with, despite them being grown adults having sex with me as a grown adult? I sure as hell am not a pedophile amp; could never sleep with anything that reminded me of a child. But if my ex boyfriends were into me, does that mean they were pedophiles? Please think on how hurtful it is for people like me to survive a whole childhood of sexual abuse, only for people to say my ADULT bodytype can normalize attraction to children. Pedophilia is a mental disorder, a paraphilia, they're attracted to the innocence, the idea of being prepubescent. You can't normalize it in the same way step-father porn hasn't normalized incest.

gt; it would be like #8220;getting with a toddler #8221; Goddd that's disgusting, I'm sorry someone thought it was okay to say such a thing. Some men really have a hard time accepting adult women are deserving of respect aside of our "fuckability" to them.

Me too! It's horrible. :( I've dated very kind men amp; I hate that such rhetoric has made me think "what if they're only into me because they're perverts?" because despite being nearly 25, I still look preeeeetty young. It really takes a toll on your self esteem when you're made to feel like a freak because apparently my body type isn't that of a "real woman".

gt; but she's wrong to act like certain bodytypes aren't used to normalize pedophilia. I disagree. Pedophiles' fantasies are kids, not women dressed or who "look" as minors. By that logic, creepy men who are into dolled up toddlers from child pageants don't count as pedophiles anymore because those girls are dressed amp; caked in makeup to the point they look much older. And by that logic, men who pursue teens who look older (think 15 year olds with lots of make up amp; big boobs but who can pass off as +18) suddenly don't count as pedophiles because "she looks older". I don't think we should judge whether someone's a pedophile or not based on the looks of the girls they find attractive, but whether or not they're interested in actual kids.
Should adult women also not be allowed to smoke, drive, vote, have sex, choose their career, their partners, political affiliation and so on until they're 25?

Oh yes, I agree with you on that! there's a lot of messed up things within the mainstream porn industry, though I don't think it's fair to label all porn as abusive because a big chunk of it are women willingly expressing their sexuality. But the current industry is definitely not good as it is.

Fair if that's what you feel. Before 25, adults know right from wrong amp; know to be responsible for their actions. I don't think a 18 or 24 year old should be tried as a child for a rape or murder. Trying to control adult women's sex life (even those in their early 20s), or implying that because an adult is young they don't have proper agency just feels really backwards to me. Speaking about science, the psychologic outcome of young adults not given agency by their parents is not really a good one. Toddlers can't control their rage until a certain age, but that doesn't mean we should allow them to rage away. They are, after all, being prepared for a future life on their own. Same with young adults. Just because someone still has some growing to do doesn't mean they need to be their hands held amp; kept in a bubble from potential harm.

I think "buying responsibly" sounds nice, but even registered breeders have their issues. When a puppy is born and they deviate from the breed, or is born with a congenital defect, or seem to have behavior "defects", they're usually euthanized. My friend's dog is a cairn terrier who was born white (and undesired colour) and they got to convince the breeder to adopt her out to my friend instead of euthanasia; same with a family member who took in two rhodesian ridgebacks who were born without ridges. Those english bulldogs puppies who can't even run around and play without collapsing from not being able to breathe also come from registered breeders, too. I say this as an absolute nut for dog breeds, I get people's wants for purebreed dogs, some breeds are just stunning and temperaments that seem perfectly tailored to you. But it's really not fair to treat sentient beings as commodities and bring them into existence to buy them when there are so many others who already exist and would likely be as good of a match (sure, not always, but even then we should really not feel entitled to own anyone).
